commit.message:
Spring integration in wicket update + fix dependency on pom

git-svn-id: https://svn.apache.org/repos/asf/incubator/syncope/trunk@1246218 13f79535-47bb-0310-9956-ffa450edef68

files.patch:
@@ -62,17 +62,6 @@
                 </exclusion>
             </exclusions>
         </dependency>
-        <dependency>
-            <groupId>org.apache.wicket</groupId>
-            <artifactId>wicket-spring-annot</artifactId>
-             <!-- exclude spring framework that wicket pulls in -->
-            <exclusions>
-                <exclusion>
-                    <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
-                    <artifactId>spring</artifactId>
-                </exclusion>
-            </exclusions>
-        </dependency>
         <dependency>
             <groupId>org.syncope</groupId>
             <artifactId>syncope-client</artifactId>
@@ -86,6 +75,10 @@
             <groupId>org.springframework</groupId>
             <artifactId>spring-webmvc</artifactId>
         </dependency>
+        <dependency>
+            <groupId>org.codehaus.jackson</groupId>
+            <artifactId>jackson-mapper-lgpl</artifactId>
+        </dependency>
     </dependencies>
 
     <build>

@@ -18,6 +18,14 @@
         <property name="restTemplate" ref="restTemplate"/>
     </bean>
 
-    <bean id="restTemplate" class="org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate" />
+    <bean id="objectMapper" class="org.codehaus.jackson.map.ObjectMapper"/>
+        
+    <bean id="mappingJacksonHttpMessageConverter"
+          class="org.springframework.http.converter.json.MappingJacksonHttpMessageConverter">
+             <property name="objectMapper" ref="objectMapper"/>
+    </bean>
 
+    <bean id="restTemplate" class="org.springframework.web.client.RestTemplate">
+        <property name="messageConverters" ref="mappingJacksonHttpMessageConverter"/>
+    </bean>
 </beans>
\ No newline at end of file
